Name: Battle Imagine - Lizardman Hunter
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Lizardman Hunter's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Thunder Suppress

Stunt! Thunder Suppress
Summon Elite: Lizardman Hunter to chant briefly, dealing Magic Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Luck and Lucky Hit Chance are increased for a period.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
